"Hard Land Of Wonder" is the first after seven years of exclusive partnership with John Porter Anita Lipnicka plate. "The idea was simple - I wanted with minimal means of expression to construct a bomb real emotional," says the artist.

Album consists of twenty premiere utworÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â³wm forming a feast for the connoisseur of unconventional acoustic sounds. For the first time Anita also appears as the sole producer and author of the project. Recording artist invited to the session musicians in England.
